languages.text: "Вы говорили с Хейнриксом? После его вызволения из плена он едва ли обменялся со мной десятком слов, но вряд ли будет отмалчиваться, если знает о чем-то, что может нам помочь!"

traits.locale_text: "Вы говорили с Хейнриксом? После его вызволения из плена он едва ли обменялся со мной десятком слов, но вряд ли будет отмалчиваться, если знает о чем-то, что может нам помочь!"
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Have you spoken to Heinrix? Since his release from captivity, he has scarcely exchanged ten words with me, but I doubt he will keep silent if he knows something that could help us!"
languages.original_text: "Вы говорили с Хейнриксом? После его вызволения из плена он едва ли обменялся со мной десятком слов, но вряд ли будет отмалчиваться, если знает о чем-то, что может нам помочь!"

traits.locale_text: "Have you spoken to Heinrix? Since his release from captivity, he has scarcely exchanged ten words with me, but I doubt he will keep silent if he knows something that could help us!"
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Have you spoken to Heinrix? Since his release from captivity, he has scarcely exchanged ten words with me, but I doubt he will keep silent if he knows something that could help us!"
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Have you spoken to Heinrix? Since his release from captivity, he has scarcely exchanged ten words with me, but I doubt he will keep silent if he knows something that could help us!"
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Have you spoken to Heinrix? Since his release from captivity, he has scarcely exchanged ten words with me, but I doubt he will keep silent if he knows something that could help us!"
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: “您有没有和海因里希谈过？自从他重获自由之后，我们几乎从来没说过话。不过，如果他知道哪些可以帮助我们的线索，他肯定愿意开口。”
languages.original_text: "Have you spoken to Heinrix? Since his release from captivity, he has scarcely exchanged ten words with me, but I doubt he will keep silent if he knows something that could help us!"

traits.locale_text: “您有没有和海因里希谈过？自从他重获自由之后，我们几乎从来没说过话。不过，如果他知道哪些可以帮助我们的线索，他肯定愿意开口。”
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.original_text: "Have you spoken to Heinrix? Since his release from captivity, he has scarcely exchanged ten words with me, but I doubt he will keep silent if he knows something that could help us!"

languages.text: «¿Ha hablado con Heinrix? Desde su liberación del cautiverio, apenas hemos intercambiado diez palabras, ¡pero dudo que guarde silencio si sabe algo que pueda ayudarnos!».
languages.original_text: "Have you spoken to Heinrix? Since his release from captivity, he has scarcely exchanged ten words with me, but I doubt he will keep silent if he knows something that could help us!"

traits.locale_text: «¿Ha hablado con Heinrix? Desde su liberación del cautiverio, apenas hemos intercambiado diez palabras, ¡pero dudo que guarde silencio si sabe algo que pueda ayudarnos!».
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: 「ハインリックスとは話しましたか？虜囚の身より解放されて以降、私は彼とはあまり言葉を交わせていません。ですが、私たちの助けとなる何かを知っているならば、彼が黙っているとは思えないのです！」
languages.original_text: "Have you spoken to Heinrix? Since his release from captivity, he has scarcely exchanged ten words with me, but I doubt he will keep silent if he knows something that could help us!"

traits.locale_text: 「ハインリックスとは話しましたか？虜囚の身より解放されて以降、私は彼とはあまり言葉を交わせていません。ですが、私たちの助けとなる何かを知っているならば、彼が黙っているとは思えないのです！」
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Habt Ihr mit Heinrix gesprochen? Seit seiner Entlassung aus der Gefangenschaft hat er kaum zehn Worte mit mir gewechselt. Er wird aber kaum schweigen, wenn er etwas weiß, was uns helfen kann!"
languages.original_text: "Have you spoken to Heinrix? Since his release from captivity, he has scarcely exchanged ten words with me, but I doubt he will keep silent if he knows something that could help us!"

traits.locale_text: "Habt Ihr mit Heinrix gesprochen? Seit seiner Entlassung aus der Gefangenschaft hat er kaum zehn Worte mit mir gewechselt. Er wird aber kaum schweigen, wenn er etwas weiß, was uns helfen kann!"
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: « Avez-vous parlé à Heinrix ? Il n'a échangé presque aucun mot avec moi depuis sa libération, mais je doute qu'il garde le silence s'il sait quelque chose qui pourrait nous aider ! »
languages.original_text: "Have you spoken to Heinrix? Since his release from captivity, he has scarcely exchanged ten words with me, but I doubt he will keep silent if he knows something that could help us!"

traits.locale_text: « Avez-vous parlé à Heinrix ? Il n'a échangé presque aucun mot avec moi depuis sa libération, mais je doute qu'il garde le silence s'il sait quelque chose qui pourrait nous aider ! »
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Heinrix ile konuştunuz mu? Salıverildikten beri benimle iki kelam etmedi. Gelgelelim bize yardımı dokunacaksa suskunluğunu korumayacaktır, bundan eminim!"
languages.original_text: "Have you spoken to Heinrix? Since his release from captivity, he has scarcely exchanged ten words with me, but I doubt he will keep silent if he knows something that could help us!"

traits.locale_text: "Heinrix ile konuştunuz mu? Salıverildikten beri benimle iki laf dahi etmedi. Fakat bize yardımı dokunacaksa suskunluğunu korumayacaktır, eminim!"
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion
